Title: Collect Beach Plastic
Description: Next time you go to the beach, collect 3 wasted
Step 1: Set a date / find an event

Title: Exchange Books
Description: Implement a book swap in your building hall
Step 1: Find a spot in your hall or install a shelf
Step 2: Bring few books you have liked and write a note to invite your neighbours to do the same
Step 3: take a picture of the new book you have got

Title: Buy Second Hand Clothes
Description: Sell your clothes to second hand store, buy new ones there
Step 2: Enquire of the dates you can leave your clothes

Title: Bring Reusable Straw
Description: Come with your reusable straw at the bar !

Title: Buy Local Food
Description: Look for shops selling local products

Title: Bike To Go to Work
Description: Get some workout out done while having fun
Step 1: Find out if one of your friends has a spare bike
Step 2: Identify your itinerary and bicycle paths on the way

Title: Replace Soaps
Description: Replace your usual with solid ones

Title: Plan Local Holidays
Description: No need to go far away to have a blast during your vacations
Step 1: There are many countryside houses waiting to be rented out
Step 2: Look up within 100km a pretty house to rent
Step 3: Take picture of your vacations and share them on instagram

Title: Plant Aromatic Plants
Description: Plant basilicum, mint outside of your window
Step 1: Install small pots hanging out of your window
Step 2: Plant them and water them every two days
Step 3: Make youself a tasty mint tea or mae pesto out of your basilicum

Title: Become Flexitarian
Description: Eat meat and fish twice a week
Step 1: Reduce th amount of meat and fish you are buying every week

Title: Stop Eating Meat
Description: Stop eating meat

Title: Be vegan
Description: Stop eating meat and diairy products
Step 1: Replace you dairy products with soy or almond ones

Title: Eat vegetables and fruits according to the season
Description: Shop your vegetables according to the season
Step 1: Look up for a seasonal calendar
Step 2: Check if your vegetables are not coming from abroad
step 4: Take a picture of your delicious recipe

Title: Grocery shop with sustainable bags
Description: Bring your own bags while shopping instead of getting every time new plastic bags
Step 1: Define which bag you will go shop with
Step 2: Refuse any plastic bags you are getting offered at the supermarket

Title: Co-sharing cars to get to work
Description: Implement at work carpooling with your colleagues to and from work
Step 1: See if you company if your company has such an intiative
Step 2: If not, invite your co workers to join this initiative
Step 3: See if your location and hours are matching

Title: Lower your lights consumption
Description: Switch to high consumption light to lower ones (LEDs)

Title: Refuse advertisement on your mailbox
Description: Install a sign saying you do not want to get advertisement on your mailbox
Step 1: FInd a nice sticker "no to advsertisment"

Title: Repair the furniture or decoration item
Description: Give your belongings a new life, repair them to give them a fresh start

Title: Implement a local exchange trade system in your neighborhood or with your friends
Description: Do not buy new tools or new things if you will use them only once, one of your neighbours or friends might have what you are looking for at home.
Step 1: When you need a new tool, ask to your friends or you neighbours if they have it
Step 2: There are platforms called local exchange trade system where you can borrow the tool
Step 3: Once you are done, return the tool to the owner

Title: Volunteer as a woofer
Description: You have few free days ? Find yourself an organic farm to volunteer to, part of the Woofing nextwork
Step 1: Go to woofing.org to find yourself an intersting project, according to the location and the time you have
Step 2: Spend awesome vacations on a local organic farm volunteering

Title: Be part of a Community Supported Agriculture network (CSA)
Description: Buy a share of the anticipated harvest and receive produce in regular vegetable and fruit basket throughout the season.
Step 1: Find a CSA next to your house
Step 2: Pick up you vegetable basket every week at the same hour to the designated location
Step 3: Enjoy receiving and discovering what the farmers harvested that week

Title: Reduce air travel
Description: Use the train in prior for distances instead of a one hour flight

Title: Take public transportation
Description: You will never be stuck into the traffic !

Title: Invest your savings in a cool projects
